Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grande Villas Resort by Diamond Resorts in Orlando (Downtown Disney® area/Lake Buena Vista), you'll be close to Orlando Premium Outlets Vineland Ave and SeaWorld® Orlando. This family-friendly condominium resort is within close proximity of Mary Queen of the Universe Shrine and Little Lake Bryan.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 408 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Cable programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

This family-friendly condominium resort is within close proximity of Mary Queen of the Universe Shrine and Little Lake Bryan.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Orlando Premium Outlets Vineland Ave - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Mary Queen of the Universe Shrine - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Little Lake Bryan - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Lake Bryan - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Disney's Lake Buena Vista Golf Course - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Downtown Disney® area - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Grand Cypress Golf Club - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
La Nouba Theater - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
DisneyQuest® - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Disney's Typhoon Lagoon Water Park - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Discovery Cove - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Disney's Osprey Ridge Golf Course - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
SeaWorld® Orlando - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Lake Buena Vista Factory Stores - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Epcot® - 4.8 km / 3 mi

The preferred airport for Grande Villas Resort by Diamond Resorts is Orlando, FL (MCO-Orlando Intl.) - 19.6 km / 12.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Cypress Pointe Grand Villas Resort is Orlando, FL (MCO-Orlando Intl.) - 19.8 km / 12.3 mi.
